message_text: This programme works! Did you know that over 200 million parents around the world have used our resources developed by Parenting for Lifelong Health, WHO, and UNICEF?

✅Participating in ParentText is optional. 
✅Your personal information is safe and private. Your name and information will not be public, but your responses will be kept and used by researchers to learn how to support families like yours.  They plan to publish the results. 
❌You can stop when you want. Just type “STOP”
❓If you have questions, ask Dr. Jamie Lachman at jamie.lachman@spi.ox.ac.uk; +44(7)840825892

Click here for more information:

If you ever return to participate in the programme, type "START". 

We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!
